009package imagingbook.pdf;
010
011import java.awt.Graphics2D;
012import java.awt.color.ColorSpace;
013import java.awt.color.ICC_Profile;
014import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
015import java.io.FileOutputStream;
016import java.io.IOException;
017import java.nio.file.Path;
018
019import com.lowagie.text.BadElementException;
020import com.lowagie.text.Document;
021import com.lowagie.text.DocumentException;
022import com.lowagie.text.Image;
023import com.lowagie.text.Rectangle;
024import com.lowagie.text.pdf.PdfContentByte;
025import com.lowagie.text.pdf.PdfGraphics2D;
026import com.lowagie.text.pdf.PdfWriter;
027
028import ij.ImagePlus;
029import ij.gui.Overlay;
030import ij.gui.Roi;
031import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.DialogDigits;
032import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.DialogHide;
033import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.DialogLabel;
034import imagingbook.common.util.ParameterBundle;
035import imagingbook.core.Info;
036
037/**
038 * Exports an {@link ImagePlus} instance, including its vector overly
039 * (if existent) to a PDF file.
040 * Configuration is accomplished by passing a {@link PdfExporter.Parameters}
041 * instance to the constructor.
042 * If selected, core Type1 fonts are substituted and embedded in the PDF.
043 * 
044 * @author WB
045 * @version 2022/03/15
046 */
047public class PdfExporter {
048
049        private static double MinStrokeWidth = 0.01;            // substitute for zero-width strokes
050
051        private final Parameters params;
052        private final ImagePlus im;
053
054        /**
055         * Parameter bundle for class {@link PdfExporter}.
056         * Annotations are used for inserting the complete parameter bundle in
057         * ImageJ's {@code GenericDialog}.
058         */
059        public static class Parameters implements ParameterBundle<PdfExporter> {
060
061                @DialogLabel("Author:")
062                public String author = System.getProperty("user.name");
063                @DialogLabel("Title:")
064                public String title = null;
065
066                @DialogLabel("Subject:")
067                public String subject = "";
068
069                @DialogLabel("Keywords:")
070                public String keywords = "";
071
072                @DialogLabel("Include raster image:")
073                public boolean includeImage = true;
074                @DialogLabel("Upscale image:")
075                public boolean upscaleImage = true;
076                @DialogLabel("Upscale factor:")@DialogDigits(0)
077                public int upscaleFactor = 1;
078                @DialogLabel("Add sRGB color profile:")
079                public boolean addIccProfile = true;
080
081                @DialogLabel("Include vector overlay:")
082                public boolean includeOverlay = true;
083                @DialogLabel("Min. stroke width:")@DialogDigits(2)
084                public double minStrokeWidth = MinStrokeWidth;
085                @DialogLabel("Embed core fonts:")
086                public boolean embedCoreFonts = true;
087
088                @DialogLabel("Include image props:")
089                public boolean includeImageProps = true;
090
091                @DialogHide
092                public boolean debug = false;
093                
094                @Override
095                public boolean validate() {
096                        return 
097                        upscaleFactor >= 1 && 
098                        minStrokeWidth >= 0;
099                }
100        }
101
102        // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
103
104        public PdfExporter(ImagePlus im, Parameters params) {
105                this.im = im;
106                this.params = params;
107        }
108
109        public PdfExporter(ImagePlus im) {
110                this(im, new Parameters());
111        }
112
113        // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
114
115        public String exportTo(Path path) {
116                final int width  = im.getWidth();       // original image size
117                final int height = im.getHeight();
118                Overlay overlay = im.getOverlay();      // original overlay (if any)
119
120                // Step 1: create the PDF document
121                Rectangle pageSize = new Rectangle(width, height);
122                
123                try (Document document = new Document(pageSize)) {
124
125                        // Step 2: create a PDF writer
126                        PdfWriter writer = null;
127                        try {
128                                writer = PdfWriter.getInstance(document, new FileOutputStream(path.toFile()));
129                        } catch (DocumentException | FileNotFoundException e) {
130                                if (params.debug) System.out.println("Could no create PdfWriter to path " + path.toString());
131                                return null;
132                        }
133
134                        // Step 3: open the document and set various properties (TODO)
135                        document.open();
136                        document.addTitle(params.title);
137                        document.addAuthor(params.author);
138                        document.addSubject(params.subject);    
139                        document.addKeywords(params.keywords);
140                        document.addCreationDate();                     
141                        document.addCreator("ImageJ Plugin (imagingbook)");
142                        document.addProducer(this.getClass().getName() + " " + Info.getVersionInfo());
143
144                        // Step 4: create a template and the associated Graphics2D context
145                        PdfContentByte cb = writer.getDirectContent();
146
147                        // Step 5: set sRGB default viewing profile
148                        if (params.addIccProfile) {
149                                ICC_Profile colorProfile = ICC_Profile.getInstance(ColorSpace.CS_sRGB);
150                                try {
151                                        writer.setOutputIntents("Custom", null, "http://www.color.org", "sRGB IEC61966-2.1", colorProfile);
152                                } catch (IOException e) { 
153                                        if (params.debug) System.out.println("Could not add ICC profile!");
154                                }
155                                //byte[] iccdata = java.awt.color.ICC_Profile.getInstance(ColorSpace.CS_sRGB).getData();
156                                //com.itextpdf.text.pdf.ICC_Profile icc = com.itextpdf.text.pdf.ICC_Profile.getInstance(iccdata);
157                        }
158
159                        // Step 6: insert the image
160                        if (params.includeImage) {
161                                ImagePlus im2 = this.im;
162                                int upscale = params.upscaleFactor;
163                                if (upscale > 1) {      // upscale the image if needed (without interpolation)
164                                        im2 = im.resize(width * upscale, height * upscale, "none");
165                                }
166                                
167                                try {
168                                        Image pdfImg = com.lowagie.text.Image.getInstance(im2.getImage(), null);
169                                        pdfImg.setAbsolutePosition(0, 0);
170                                        pdfImg.scaleToFit(width, height);       // fit to the original size             
171                                        cb.addImage(pdfImg);
172                                } catch (BadElementException | IOException e) {
173                                        if (params.debug) System.out.println("Could not insert image!");
174                                        return null;
175                                }
176                        }
177
178                        // Step 7: draw the vector overlay
179                        if (overlay != null && params.includeOverlay) {
180                                // https://stackoverflow.com/questions/17667615/how-can-itext-embed-font-used-by-jfreechart-for-chart-title-and-labels?rq=1
181                                Graphics2D g2 = (params.embedCoreFonts) ? 
182                                                new PdfGraphics2D(cb, width, height, new CoreFontMapper(), false, false, 0) : 
183                                                new PdfGraphics2D(cb, width, height); // no core font embedding
184
185                                Roi[] roiArr = overlay.toArray();
186                                for (Roi roi : roiArr) {
187                                        double sw = roi.getStrokeWidth();
188                                        if (sw < params.minStrokeWidth) {       // sometimes stroke width is simply not set (= 0)
189                                                roi.setStrokeWidth(params.minStrokeWidth);      // temporarily change stroke width
190                                        }
191                                        ImagePlus tmpIm = roi.getImage();
192                                        roi.setImage(null);     // trick learned from Wayne to ensure magnification is 1
193                                        roi.drawOverlay(g2);    // replacement (recomm. by Wayne)
194                                        roi.setImage(tmpIm);
195                                        if (sw < 0.001f) {
196                                                roi.setStrokeWidth(sw); // restore original stroke width
197                                        }       
198                                }
199                                g2.dispose();
200                        }
201
202                        // Step 8: copy ImagePlus custom properties to PDF
203                        if (params.includeImageProps) {
204                                String[] props = im.getPropertiesAsArray();
205                                if (props != null) {
206                                        for (int i = 0; i < props.length; i+=2) {
207                                                String key = props[i];
208                                                String val = props[i + 1];
209                                                document.addHeader(key, val);
210                                        }
211                                }
212                        }
213
214                        // Step 9: close PDF document
215                        //document.close();
216                }       // auto-close
217                
218                return path.toAbsolutePath().toString();
219        }
220
221}
